private_settings.name: auth_client_email
private_settings.title: Client Email
private_settings.description: The Client Email of your Service Account. Invite the service account as Editor to your spreadsheet.

private_settings.name: auth_private_key
private_settings.title: Private Key
private_settings.description: The Private Key of your Service Account.

private_settings.name: auth_private_key_id
private_settings.title: Private Key
private_settings.description: The Private Key of your Service Account.

private_settings.name: account_synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Account Filter
private_settings.description: Send Hull Accounts when they are part of one of these segments.

private_settings.name: account_range
private_settings.title: Account Range
private_settings.description: The range in A1 notion for accounts in Google Sheets, e.g. `Sheet1!A:A`.

private_settings.name: account_attribute
private_settings.title: Account Attribute
private_settings.description: Select the account attribute to send to Google Sheets.

private_settings.name: user_synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: User Filter
private_settings.description: Send Hull Users when they are part of one of these segments.

private_settings.name: user_range
private_settings.title: User Range
private_settings.description: The range in A1 notion for users in Google Sheets, e.g. `Sheet1!A:A`.

private_settings.name: user_attribute
private_settings.title: User Attribute
private_settings.description: Select the user attribute to send to Google Sheets.

settings_sections.title: Google Sheets
settings_sections.description: Configure the parameters to authorize the Google Sheets API.

settings_sections.title: User Profiles
settings_sections.description: Define which user profiles are synchronized.
